• {{ dato.name }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ServicioPostsService } from '../../services/pokeServices'; @Component({ selector: 'app-clientes', templateUrl: './clientes.component.html', styleUrls: ['./clientes.component.css'] }) export class ClientesComponent implements OnInit { datos:any; constructor(private servicio: ServicioPostsService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.datos = this.servicio.getPosts(); } }
